member.name: T:KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.KeyFolioEnvelope
member.summary: Self-describing envelope for ciphertext material. Format: keyfolio:v1:<salt>.<nonce>.<ct> Where salt/nonce/ct are Base64Url. ct contains ciphertext+tag.

member.name: M:KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.KeyFolioEnvelope.#ctor(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.Byte[])
member.summary: Self-describing envelope for ciphertext material. Format: keyfolio:v1:<salt>.<nonce>.<ct> Where salt/nonce/ct are Base64Url. ct contains ciphertext+tag.

member.name: P:KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.KeyFolioOptions.Pbkdf2Iterations
member.summary: PBKDF2 iteration count. (210k is a decent modern baseline.)

member.name: P:KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.KeyFolioOptions.NonceSizeBytes
member.summary: Nonce size for AES-GCM in bytes (12 recommended).

member.name: T:KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.ISecretProvider
member.summary: Provides the shared passphrase (NOT the derived AES key).

member.name: T:KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.DirectSecretProvider
member.summary: Simple provider that wraps a provided string. Useful for tests and callers that already have the secret.

member.name: T:KeyFolio.Core.KeyFolio
member.summary: Public fa√ßade for KeyFolio encryption and decryption. Consumers should start here.

member.name: M:KeyFolio.Core.KeyFolio.Encrypt(System.String,KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.ISecretProvider)
member.summary: Encrypts a UTF-8 string and returns a portable, versioned envelope string.

member.name: M:KeyFolio.Core.KeyFolio.Decrypt(System.String,KeyFolio.Core.Crypto.ISecretProvider)
member.summary: Decrypts a KeyFolio envelope string back into the original UTF-8 text.
